name: Space Repair!
description:
Protect your cryogenically frozen crew from a never ending onslaught of asteroids in this challenging and addicting game!

C O N T R O L S 

---------------------

- WASD to move.

- Space to upgrade yourself.

- Space + direction to repair.

- M to toggle between: music and sound, sound, and silent.

- P to pause.

 M U S I C

-------------

"Welcome!"             by RoccoW from the album ロッコ

"Bleeps Galore"     by RoccoW from the album ロッコ
